channel.title: Comments on: Three months in with the new MacBook Pro

item.title: By: Theo Heselmans
item.dc:creator: Theo Heselmans
item.description: <p>Matt, I have exactly the same keyboard issue! I type a lot more errors than before. I’m pretty sure it's due to the keys being a bit bigger and thus further apart. And like you, it has only improved slightly over the past months.<br/>Otherwise (except for needing a dongle for everything you want to connect), it’s a lovely machine.</p>
item.content:encoded:
Matt, I have exactly the same keyboard issue! I type a lot more errors than before. I’m pretty sure it’s due to the keys being a bit bigger and thus further apart. And like you, it has only improved slightly over the past months.
Otherwise (except for needing a dongle for everything you want to connect), it’s a lovely machine.
